goal.ch: 該課程的目標是為您提供（i）瞭解美國和國際證券市場的投資領域；（ii）瞭解各種投資工具的估值，包括普通股、債券、期權和期貨；（iii）證券價格的經驗行為和有效市場假設；（iv）資產定價理論；以及（v）投資組合管理的分析技能。
goal.en: The course objectives are to provide you with (i) an understanding of investment fields in the U.S. and international securities markets; (ii) knowledge of valuations of various investment instruments, including common stocks, bonds, options, and futures; (iii) empirical behavior of security prices and the efficient market hypothesis; (iv) asset pricing theories; and (v) analytical skills for portfolio management.
